          <title>
            <string language="en">Lowering the melting temperature of aluminium oxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Senken der schmelzenden Temperatur des 
Aluminiumoxyds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Abaissement de la température de fonte de 
l'oxyde d'aluminium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abaixando a temperatura de derretimento do óxido
de alumínio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbassamento della temperatura di fusione 
dell'ossido di alluminio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαμήλωμα της θερμοκρασίας τήξης του οξειδίου 
αλουμινίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bajar la temperatura que derrite del óxido de 
aluminio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates an experiment to demonstrate how to lower the melting temperature of aluminium oxide by adding cryolite.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cryolite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixtures</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht ein Experiment, 
um zu zeigen, wie man die schmelzende Temperatur des Aluminiumoxyds 
senkt, indem es Kryolith hinzufügt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre une expérience pour 
démontrer comment abaisser la température de fonte de l'oxyde 
d'aluminium en ajoutant la cryolithe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra uma experiência para 
demonstrar como abaixar a temperatura de derretimento do óxido de 
alumínio adicionando o cryolite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra un esperimento per 
dimostrare come abbassare la temperatura di fusione dell'ossido di 
alluminio aggiungendo la criolite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί ένα πείραμα για να 
καταδείξει πώς να χαμηλώσει τη θερμοκρασία τήξης του οξειδίου 
αλουμινίου με την προσθήκη του κρυόλιθου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra un experimento para 
demostrar cómo bajar la temperatura que derrite del óxido de 
aluminio agregando la criolita.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
